TEXT.TITLE: PAKISTAN TO TENDER FOR RBD PALM OLEIN TOMORROW
TEXT.BODY: Pakistan will tender tomorrow for 12,000 tonnes of refined bleached deodorised palm olein tomorrow, split in two equal cargo lots for first and second half April shipments, traders said. The tender will be financed with Islamic Development Bank credit. Reuter
